mxCell.value: Connect to web app from a browser
We're going to do a few things slightly wrong!
Have to install dependencies before running the app
Have to run a command to start up the server
Run some commands to install additional programs
Specify a command to run on container startup
Most of docker images has alpine version with small number of featuers
Hard drive segment for this process
Need to copy package.json file from hard drive to the docker file system
Instruction telling Docker Server what to do

Path to folder to copy from on *your machine* relative to build context

./ mean the current working directory
Place to copy stuff to inside *the container*

• There is no limitation for out going traffic from the container
  • But there is limitation for in comming traffic to the container
Route incoming requests to this port on local host to...
Any following command will be executed relative to this path in the container

1. Best practice to set working directory in Dockerfile without coping files directly to docker file sysytem root from our hard disk
  2. reason when copying files to container root file system some of the files and folders in the there by default can be override with copying files.

When ever we change line in the Dockerfile that change will nt be immediatly reflect in the running container
So we have to rebuild the container but when we rebuilding container file all the lines below the changed line cant use the cache and they will rebuild
